recipe.title: Beer-Steamed Clams
ingredients: 5 pounds hard-shell clams (such as littlenecks), scrubbed
instructions: Bring beer to a boil in a large heavy pot. Add clams. Cover pot, reduce heat to medium, and steam clams until they open, 6–8 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer clams to a large bowl or platter (discard any that do not open). Serve with lemon halves.
